meanings.definition: A method of waste disposal in which garbage is buried between layers of earth.
meanings.sent1: The landfill was filled with trash and covered with soil.
meanings.sent2: The city decided to build a new landfill to manage the increasing amount of garbage.
meanings.sent3: The landfill had a surprise visitor when a raccoon decided to explore the area.
meanings.sent4: The landfill was like a hidden treasure chest buried beneath the ground.
meanings.sent5: The smell coming from the landfill was unbearable, reminding everyone of the importance of recycling.

meanings.definition: A location where waste is buried in the ground.
meanings.sent1: We visited the landfill to see how our trash was being managed.
meanings.sent2: The landfill was carefully monitored to prevent any environmental damage.
meanings.sent3: The landfill became a popular spot for scavenging seagulls looking for food.
meanings.sent4: The landfill symbolized the hidden impact of human consumption on the planet.
meanings.sent5: The landfill stretched for miles, a somber reminder of our throwaway culture.
